rankings.title: The First Retirement Age — Civil War Pensions and Elderly Labor Supply at the Age-62 Threshold
conditions: documenting fuzziness/take-up with external pension-roll evidence or framing clearly as eligibility ITT
running full McCrary/age-heaping checks
donut/binned-age robustness
confirming no contemporaneous age-62 rules for veterans besides the pension act

rankings.title: City Limits — Population Thresholds and the Rise of Municipal Public Health (1900-1920)
conditions: a clean statute-by-state threshold database
verifying sharpness/fuzziness
securing a mortality dataset with broad city coverage or using alternative outcomes with wide coverage

rankings.title: The Age of Innocence — State Age-of-Consent Reform and Female Human Capital Formation (1880s-1920s)
conditions: redesign toward a difference-in-discontinuities / event-study around reform dates
documenting bindingness
exceptions
careful choice of outcomes that plausibly move at the margin—e.g.
marriage status at ages just below/above
or fertility later by cohort exposed
